title: Philosophy
description:
This project is an example of how neural networks can already be used to ensure information security.
In this project, a neural network scans network traffic and looks for anomalies in it. You can train a neural network on your own dataset and get interesting results.

title: All traffic
description: On this page you can monitor internet traffic in real time using WireShark. You can select the network interface you need.

title: Network anomalies
description: This page displays the anomalies found by the neural network.

title: Education AI
description:
On this page you can train the neural network and monitor training metrics. For training, you can upload datasets with a maximum size of up to 200MB.
Warning: Use CAP traffic extensions.
